name: Joe Blade II
overview: Joe Blade II is a fighting game in which you punch and kick (by jumping) various bad guys while attempting to rescue 16 citizens trapped by the mobs in the city. It also features "subgames" which are generally matching or ordering numbers at specific points; these were most likely a form of protection as much as gameplay, as they add little to the basic fighting game type. According to the author, the Atari version was ported from the Amstrad version.
